Room.Name: The Respite
Room.Description: A cool pond of crystal clear water lies in the middle of a small clearing. Flowers of various colors surround the pond, and birds frolic through the air singing happy songs. The peaceful sensation urges you to sit down, rest, have a drink of fresh water, and take a relaxing break from the toils the forest has to offer.

Exit.Flags: Door Closed Locked PickProof NoPass NoBash

Room.Name: The Channeler's & Elementalist's Guild
Room.Description: Upon entering this room, you are amazed at how tidy it actually is. It goes against everything you have ever heard of about a wizard's workshop. There are orderly bookshelves along all of the walls, containing treatises on magic and magic theory. Tables are spaced evenly throughout the room, allowing contemplative study and thought. The guildmaster sits at his desk, patiently leafing through a spellbook, waiting to answer any questions you may have for him. The doorway to the south leads outside.

Room.Name: The Ranger's Guild
Room.Description: This peaceful appearing glade contains several people tending to a wide variety of wild animals or working on an assortment of wooded projects. The fluid grace with which they go about their tasks belies their deadly combative skills. The guildmaster queitly approaches and offers her services. Civilization starts to the south.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Channeler's & Elementalist's Guild
Room.Description: A nice footpath leads to an elegant house set back off the street, overlooking the ocean. A crisp breeze ruffles your hair as you walk up to the door. The front door of the residence is to the north and the street continues to the south.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Necromancer's Guild
Room.Description: A wizard's tower stands before you. Tendrils of smoke seem to waft from the windows as you approach. The door appears to be to the east, while the street continues to the south.

Room.Name: The Necromancer's Guild
Room.Description: The prototypical wizard's laboratory. Beakers and vials of every shape and size clutter the workbenches lining the walls of this room. Corpses in every state of decay are strewn throughout the room. A wizened old woman stands by one of the tables and offers her assistance in training you. The doorway to the west leads out.

Room.Name: The Warrior's Guild
Room.Description: A large training field and parade ground are here. Scores of young people are paired off to train defensive and offensive skills with each other, both hand to hand and weapon's training. A very large man is efficiently aiding any and all who seek to learn from his great wisdom in all the tactical disciplines. A doorway leads to the east.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Warrior's Guild
Room.Description: A large tent-like structure sits right off the roadway here. It has a weapons rack and an armor rack leaned against opposite walls. Through the doorway to the west, sounds of clashing arms can be heard. The street continues to the south.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Ranger's Guild
Room.Description: A small glade is here. It appears very peaceful and quiet. A sense of serenity passes over you as you hear a large variety of birds singing. A trail leads further north through the glade while the street is to the south.

Room.Name: Road in the NorthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Varicolored peonies, of every imaginable tint, create a winsome, lighthearted atmostphere along the street leading around the NorthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the exotic, and sometimes dangerous, fish that grace the sea surrounding the town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the south and east.

Room.Name: Road in the NorthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Varicolored peonies, of every imaginable tint, create a winsome, lighthearted atmostphere along the street leading around the NorthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the exotic, and sometimes dangerous, fish that grace the sea surrounding the town. Room.Description: Violets, ranging from the lightest mauves to the deepest midnight blues, cheerfully decorate the street leading around the NorthEast Quadrant. Room.Description: Varicolored peonies, of every imaginable tint, create a winsome, lighthearted atmostphere along the street leading around the NorthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the exotic, and sometimes dangerous, fish that grace the sea surrounding the town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the east is the Naiadian Guardsmen's Headquarters and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Guardsmen's Headquarters
Room.Description: This obsidian building stands out like a rose among briars in this lovely city, but it has a beauty of a subtly different nature, making it fit in easily. The shield and symbol of the Naiadian Guardsmen adorn the walls to either side of the doorway. The business offices are functional, but slightly enchanting as well. The guardsmen come here to receive their orders for the day and to unwind after their shifts. The place seems to be alive with a constant bustle, but no one seems to be rushed. The lack of serious crime on this island is apparent in the easy manner of the guards; however, they do handle their weapons in a professional manner. The training facilities are state of the art and the instructors are firm taskmasters. Clearly this professional force can handle any amount of trouble if the need were ever to arise. The street continues to the west.

Room.Name: The Mayor's Office
Room.Description: This is the place where it all begins, the office of the lady in charge. Here is where legislation from the town council is signed into law. The mayor is a happy woman, and it shows in the way she runs things. People from near and far come to Naiadia to study the day to day operation of this government, for it is truly a marvel of the known world. The street continues to the north.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Townhall
Room.Description: This is the building in which the Naiadian Council meets to pass the laws governing this fair city. All meetings are open to any who wish to view them, but only the council members may vote. No meeting is currently going on, but people wander through the building, admiring the works of art and talking. The street continues to the east.

Room.Name: Road in the NorthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Varicolored peonies, of every imaginable tint, create a winsome, lighthearted atmostphere along the street leading around the NorthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the exotic, and sometimes dangerous, fish that grace the sea surrounding the town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the west is the Naiadian Townhall and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: A Sandy Path
Room.Description: This lovely, palm tree lined path is covered in fine beach sand, polished by the wind and waves for so long that it is nearly white. It reflects back both the sunlight by day and the moonlight by night in an almost hypnotic fashion. The North Gate is to the south and the beach is to the north.

Room.Name: Road in the NorthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Violets, ranging from the lightest mauves to the deepest midnight blues, cheerfully decorate the street leading around the NorthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the various seashells that wash up on the beaches outside of town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the east is the Lobster Pot and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: The Lobster Pot
Room.Description: This small cozy restaurant has a decided nautical cast to its decor. There are lifebuoys, life preservers, sailor's outfits, and other seagoing items lining the walls. The aroma of boiled lobster wafts from the kitchen, making your mouth water as you wait for the first taste of the exquisitely prepared food. The doorway to the west leads back outside.

Room.Name: The Memorial
Room.Description: As you enter this room, a wave of reverence fills your entire body. This shrine is dedicated to all of the ships that have been lost at sea over the years. The people of this fine city have placed a marker here commemorating all the sailors lost in this region.

Room.Name: The Armory
Room.Description: This small store is filled with an unbelievable assortment of armor and protective devices. There is a slight nautical cast to the selection, as is to be expected in the middle of the sea, but there are more common items as well. The shopkeeper smiles a winning smile as you enter the door and proudly shows you his wares. The street continues to the east.

Room.Name: Road in the NorthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Violets, ranging from the lightest mauves to the deepest midnight blues, cheerfully decorate the street leading around the NorthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the various seashells that wash up on the beaches outside of town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the west is the Armory and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Road in the NorthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Varicolored peonies, of every imaginable tint, create a winsome, lighthearted atmostphere along the street leading around the NorthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the exotic, and sometimes dangerous, fish that grace the sea surrounding the town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the east is the Naiadian Jail and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: The Naiadian Jail
Room.Description: Even the detention center for this community is aesthetically pleasing. Troublemakers are kept in orderly rooms, furnished adequate food, and treated with respect even though they broke the law. The windows are numerous and filled with a magical construct of glassteel, utterly unbreakable but transparent as a still pond. The walls are of thick marble, but they are in pastel shades to match the ever present flora of the city. The doorway to the west leads back to the street.

Room.Name: First Bank of Naiadia
Room.Description: Tastefully decorated in an ocean motif, the First Bank of Naiadia happily caters to the townsfolk and all the seafarers just passing through. A small, plush couch has been placed along one wall for the comfort of those waiting their turn in line. Beautifully hand embroidered, it depicts a scene of a coral reef. The road is to the south.

Room.Name: Road in the NorthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Varicolored peonies, of every imaginable tint, create a winsome, lighthearted atmostphere along the street leading around the NorthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the exotic, and sometimes dangerous, fish that grace the sea surrounding the town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the south and east.

Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the exotic, and sometimes dangerous, fish that grace the sea surrounding the town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the east is the North Gate and the road continues to the north and west.

Room.Name: North Gate
Room.Description: Ivy, carefully pruned back so as not to overwhelm the flowers growing nearby, creeps up the brick colonnades and onto the gates themselves. Painted white to offset the gracefully climbing vines, the gates are handworked wrought iron, specially treated to avoid rust in the corrosive sea air. Although closed at night, the gates are never locked, for the people of Naiadia have always led an untroubled, worry-free existance. North leads to the sea, south leads to the Center Square, east leads to the NorthEast Quadrant and west leads to the NorthWest Quadrant.

Room.Name: Road in the NorthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Violets, ranging from the lightest mauves to the deepest midnight blues, cheerfully decorate the street leading around the NorthEast Quadrant. Room.Name: The Training Yard
Room.Description: People from all walks of life come to this place to enrich themselves, physically and mentally. There are knowledgeable instructors on hand to show you how to properly work out to increase your physical and mental attributes. As you enter, a genial, young man walks up to you and offers his services. The street continues to the south.

Room.Name: The Weapon's Emporium
Room.Description: This small shop contains the finest in weaponry, both exotic and commonplace. There is a large variety to choose from and the salesman is quite knowledgeable about their origins. With a knowing eye he appraises your weapons and offers you the assortment that seems to be what you are in need of. The doorway to the east leads back out to the street.

Room.Name: Road in the NorthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Violets, ranging from the lightest mauves to the deepest midnight blues, cheerfully decorate the street leading around the NorthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the various seashells that wash up on the beaches outside of town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the west is the Weapon's Emporium and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Description: Varicolored peonies, of every imaginable tint, create a winsome, lighthearted atmostphere along the street leading around the NorthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the exotic, and sometimes dangerous, fish that grace the sea surrounding the town. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the south is the West Gate and the road continues to the north and west.

Room.Name: The Central Walkway
Room.Description: The busiest section of Naiadia, many townsfolk stroll around the walkway, stopping almost constantly to chat with neighbors and friends. Wrought iron benches, painted white and handworked to depict life under the sea, have been thoughfully laid out at intervals so that those wishing to stay and talk for a while can make themselves comfortable. Tulips of various shading and hues have been lovingly planted on either side of the benches to further enhance the cozy atmosphere. The gentle fragrance of magnolias drifts past from a nearby tree. The walkway continues to the south and east.

Room.Name: Center Square
Room.Description: A giant magnolia tree, its heady fragrance intoxicating the senses, stands in the heart of Naiadia casting soft shadows all across the Center Square. It's branches sway back and forth in the gentle breeze drifting in off the ocean, gently rocking the small swing someone attached to it. When the healer is free from his regular duties, he gladly pushes any small child who wants a ride. Despite the fact that all meeting and gatherings are held here, the grass is always perfectly manicured and not a speck of litter can be found anywhere. The Square leads north, south, east and west to the Central Walkway.

Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the south and east.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the east is the Land Lubber's Boat Shop and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: The Land Lubber's Boat Shop
Room.Description: This bungalow contains rafts and boats of all types. All of the selections are in pristine order, as if the proprietor had just finished the final coat of paint. A smiling sailor welcomes you and offers his wares. The steet continues to the west.

Room.Name: The Source of Magic
Room.Description: This small shop is crammed full of magical things, although everything is very orderly and well seperated. There are potions, scrolls, artifacts, components, and other items too numerous to mention. A beautiful woman, with gentle brown eyes, offers you foci and implements of magical origins. She has quite a collection of some of the most fascinating treasures you have ever seen. The doorway to the north leads back out into town.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the north and east.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the east is the South gate and the road continues to the south and west.

Room.Name: South Gate
Room.Description: Ivy, carefully pruned back so as not to overwhelm the flowers growing nearby, creeps up the brick colonnades and onto the gates themselves. Painted white to offset the gracefully climbing vines, the gates are handworked wrought iron, specially treated to avoid rust in the corrosive sea air. This gate is never closed, as many couples, yearning for a few minutes alone, and townsfolk, seeking some exercise, enjoy taking moonlit strolls through the beautiful gardens to the south. North leads to the Center Square, east leads to the SouthEast Quadrant and west leads to the SouthWest Quadrant.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the west is the South Gate and the road continues to the south and east.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the north and west.

Room.Name: The General Store
Room.Description: Bins of various supplies fill this store. Adventuring needs, household provisions and more are available to suit any purpose. The items have been thoughtfully grouped together by type of need to make shopping easier. The shopkeeper stands behind a counter, smiling a friendly, welcoming smile as you enter the room. The doorway to the north leads back out to the street.

Room.Name: Antiques and Collectibles
Room.Description: At first, the clutter in this room seems to be just junk and refuse of the worst possible sort. But, after consideration, you notice that these items are retrieved salvage from nearby shipwrecks. Each individual piece has its own unique history. Entering this room is like stepping back in time to when these pieces belonged to others. A matronly woman bustles up and begins telling you tales about each piece that you seem interested in. The doorway to the east leads back to the normal flow of things.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the west is Antiques and Collectibles and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the east is Aquatic Pets and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Aquatic Pets
Room.Description: This classy little shop contains an assortment of playful animals. Just like everything else on the island, there is a little bit of a maritime air about the place. There are large fishtanks with beautiful exotic species of fish swimming inside. There are also island lizards, a few species of bird, and even a few seals. A friendly young lady walks up and ask to assist you in any way she can. The street continues to the west.

Room.Name: The Storeroom
Room.Description: The pets are kept here.

Room.Name: The Vegetarian's Delight
Room.Description: A tempting variety of fruits and vegetables fill the shelves of this cozy cafe. Everything from seaweed to fresh fruits of many varieties are offered here. The owner smiles pleasantly at you as he points out the specials he is offering today. The street continues to the east.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the west is the Vegetarian's Delight and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Path to the Gardens
Room.Description: Half sand, half dirt, this small path is extremely well traversed. Rows of multicolored pansies and petunias, patterened in the shapes of the surrounding sealife, line both sides of the walkway, giving passerbys a small preview of the elegantly laid out gardens they lead to. The path leads north to town and south to the gardens.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the east is the Sushi Bar and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: The Sushi Bar
Room.Description: Several intimate tables have been spaciously scattered throughout the restuarant. Vases, artistically decorated with deep blue orchids, grace the center of each table. Candlelight casts soft shadows across the room, as waiters move discretely from table to table, serving meals with the utmost effeciency and decorum. The road is to the west.

Room.Name: Ye Olde Salt Saloon
Room.Description: Walking the streets of this island paradise can sure work up a thirst. Luckily, an old sailor noticed the lack of quality drinking establishments in the city. Opening this tavern turned out to be the finest decision of his life. People fill this room constantly. There is always a line at the door waiting to get in. Waitresses walk by carrying trays laden with fine beverages. A large bouncer sits at one end of a long teakwood and mahoganey bar, while the bartender rushes to keep up with all the orders. The doorway to the south leads out to the street.

Room.Name: Gemstones
Room.Description: Long glass cases containing red velvet settings fill this chamber. The jewelry and baubles here would impress anyone. There are rare black pearls and fascinating amethysts and sapphires. Diamonds, emeralds, and rubies abound as well. All of the fittings appear to be either platinum or gold of the highest quality. Necklaces that seem to be worth a king's ransom lie beside some of the most exquisite rings you have ever seen. A leathery old man with a jeweller's loupe in his eye looks up as you enter and offers to help you make your selection. The doorway to the east returns to the street.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the west is Gemstones and the road continues to the north and south.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the north and east.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the south is the Anti-Paladin's Guild and the road continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the north is Skins 'R' Us, to the south is the Paladin's Guild and the road continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the south is the Cleric's Guild and the road continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthWest Quadrant
Room.Description: Anemonies, ranging in various shades of white, red and purple, lend a lively air to the street leading around the SouthWest Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the beautiful mermaids and handsome mermen for which the town was named. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the north and west.

Room.Name: Path to the Gardens
Room.Description: Half sand, half dirt, this small path is extremely well traversed. Rows of multicolored pansies and petunias, patterened in the shapes of the surrounding sealife, line both sides of the walkway, giving passerbys a small preview of the elegantly laid out gardens they lead to. The path leads north to town and south to the gardens.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the north and east.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the north is Ye Olde Salt Saloon, to the south is the Assassin's Guild and the road continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. To the south is the Thieves' Guild and the road continues to the east and west.

Room.Name: Road in the SouthEast Quadrant
Room.Description: Multicolored crocus, of every conceivable hue and shade, stylishly enchace the street leading around the SouthEast Quadrant. Carefully laid out and lovingly tended, they form the shapes of the wild and deadly sea serpents that plague those who travel across the Naiadian Sea. The street itself is paved in brick, imported from some faraway land. The road continues to the north and west.

Room.Name: The Anti-Paladin's Guild
Room.Description: You are in a dark, cold room filled with devices of torture and unholy symbols dedicated to the dark Gods. Men and women of all races study to better themselves at the arts of harming the realm and its' inhabitants. The only exit is east to the buildings entrance.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Anti-Paladin's
Room.Description: The building erected here is dark and forboding. Unlike the rest of the city this guild appears almost to be relegated to the backstreets as some kind of foul parasitic presence. The road lies to the north.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Paladin's Guild
Room.Description: A small plot of undeveloped land is here. There are various plants growing upon it that, although naturally occurring in this environment, don't really fit in with the general aesthetic beauty of the rest of the town. The street continues to the north or you can go further into the plot to the south.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Cleric's & Monk's Guild
Room.Description: A small wayside temple is to the east. Non-descript and completely unadorned, you barely glance at it once and then continue on your way. The road continues to the north.

Room.Name: The Cleric's & Monk's Guild
Room.Description: This temple is much grander than it appeared from the outside. There are many men and women here, some are involved in hand to hand and light weapons combat training, while others sit in contemplative study. A woman with a broad smile on her face walks toward you and offers her services. The doorway to the west leads outside.

Room.Name: Path to the Gardens
Room.Description: Half sand, half dirt, this small path is extremely well traversed. Rows of multicolored pansies and petunias, patterened in the shapes of the surrounding sealife, line both sides of the walkway, giving passerbys a small preview of the elegantly laid out gardens they lead to. The path leads north to town and south to the gardens.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Assassin's Guild
Room.Description: A beautiful Zan rock garden is open here beside the street. Every individual stone seems to have its own place in the greater whole. The mastery of this garden shows that someone or more than likely a group of someones has dedicated years to making this garden perfect. A small pagoda-style building stands to the south or you may continue along the road to the north.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Thieves' Guild
Room.Description: A warehouse sits here, abutting the city wall. This is more than likely the storage location for most of the merchants in this area. The door into the offices leads to the east, and the street lies back to the north.

Room.Name: The Thieves' Guild
Room.Description: With surprise, you realize just how much of those merchant's wealth comes here. There are piles of every conceivable type of valuable merchandise from everywhere in the town. The thieves in this town must use this as a centralized clearing house. From the look of things, the local law enforcement officials are woefully overpaid. A short, nondescript man looks up as you enter. He quietly asks you to state your business. The doorway to the west returns you to the warehouse.

Room.Name: The Paladin's Guild
Room.Description: The back half of the plot contains a magnificent altar. An elegant man intones words of praise to the Gods of good. Wave after wave of peace washes over you as the beauty of this holy place eases your fears and worries. The elegant looking man turns toward you and offers you a comfortable place to rest before asking what assistance you might have need of. The street is farther back to the north.

Room.Name: The Orchid Garden
Room.Description: Graceful and delicate, orchids of every imaginable color and size fill one corner of the garden. Every available space is taken up by these beautiful buds, barely leaving enough room for people to stroll through. Here and there, a hummingbird can be seen flitting from flower to flower, looking for nectar. The path leads south and east.

Room.Name: A Path in the Garden
Room.Description: Rows of rare and exotic flowers line the carpeted pathway. The fusion of colors is perfectly coordinated to create a magnificent feast for the eyes. Lovingly tended and perfectly manicured, the gardens are treasured by all who call Naiadia home. The path leads north to town and south, east and west through the gardens.

Room.Name: The Sunflower Garden
Room.Description: Sunflowers, bright as the midday sun, create a haven for frogs, mice and other small creatures that thrive within their gentle shade. Standing as tall as a the tallest man, they lend a lively, cheerful air to their corner of the gardens. The path leads south and west.

Room.Name: The Assassin's Guild
Room.Description: This pagoda contains the local branch of the brotherhood of assassins, a closeknit group of people whose worldwide network of guilds allow them the ultimate in information gathering. These people do not kill for spite or whim. They serve any who will meet their price, merely doing their job in a slick and businesslike manner. An aged man bows as you enter and offers his service in training you in the ways of your path. The garden lies back to the north.

Room.Name: A Path in the Garden
Room.Description: Rows of rare and exotic flowers line the carpeted pathway. The fusion of colors is perfectly coordinated to create a magnificent feast for the eyes. Lovingly tended and perfectly manicured, the gardens are treasured by all who call Naiadia home. The path leads north, south and east.

Room.Name: The Fountain
Room.Description: Four beautiful mermaids, contentedly sunning themselves on an outcropping of rocks, graces this finely detailed and exquisitely sculpted fountain. Each mermaid, lovingly fashioned by a true master of his craft, is such a rare and stunning beauty that you find yourself completely mesmerized, wondering if such perfection of form and face could truly exist. A small rainbow archs gracefully over the fountain, shimmering with a magical aura. The path leads north, south, east and west.

Room.Name: A Path in the Garden
Room.Description: Rows of rare and exotic flowers line the carpeted pathway. The fusion of colors is perfectly coordinated to create a magnificent feast for the eyes. Lovingly tended and perfectly manicured, the gardens are treasured by all who call Naiadia home. The path leads north, south and west.

Room.Name: The Lily Garden
Room.Description: Virginal white water lilies fill the small pond in this quiet corner of the gardens. Here and there, a goldfish can be swimming amongst the flowers, its golden scales reflecting the light, while dragonflies whiz about, causing tiny ripples along the waters surface. A multitudes of tiger lilies surround the pond on three sides, lending a tropical air to this serene setting. The path leads north and east.

Room.Name: A Path in the Garden
Room.Description: Rows of rare and exotic flowers line the carpeted pathway. The fusion of colors is perfectly coordinated to create a magnificent feast for the eyes. Lovingly tended and perfectly manicured, the gardens are treasured by all who call Naiadia home. The path leads north, south, east and west.

Room.Name: The Rose Garden
Room.Description: Tall and proud, a multitude of rose bushes vie for dominance in this corner of the garden, their riotous colours sparkling brilliantly with dew. Even in the heat of midday, the bushes are so dense and healthy that the sun cannot burn off the water. Their distinct, yet delicate fragrances swirl together to create an intoxicating aphrodesiac that stimulates the senses. The path leads north and west.

Room.Name: The Lover's Nest
Room.Description: The only spot in the gardens where trees can be found, this tiny paradise is almost completely hidden away, making it a perfect spot for clandestine meetings. Flowering vines, nurtured by the tiny pool in the center of the glade, wind their way up the tree trunks, as they lightly scent the air with their intoxicating fragrance. A small path leads east.

Room.Name: A Path in the Garden
Room.Description: Rows of rare and exotic flowers line the carpeted pathway. The fusion of colors is perfectly coordinated to create a magnificent feast for the eyes. Lovingly tended and perfectly manicured, the gardens are treasured by all who call Naiadia home. The path leads north, east and west.

Room.Name: A Cozy Nook
Room.Description: Nestled admist the wildflowers is a beautifully carved, wooden bench for two. Barely discernible from the path, many lovers seek it as a refuge from the rest of the world. The muted sounds of bird calls fill the air, lending to the tranquil quality of this tiny hide-a-way. A small path leads west.

Room.Name: Skins 'R' Us
Room.Description: This quaint little boutique contains a nice selection of various articles of clothing made from the local sealife. Everything from a genuine sharkskin suit to a naughty little teddy made of seashells. Trained salesclerks wander through the store assisting the customers. The doorway to the south leads back to the street.

NPC.name: cat gray
NPC.description: Beloved pet of the Gods, this medium sized, gray tabby spends his days napping or playing with his best buddy.
NPC.longDescription: A medium, gray tabby cat is happily chasing a butterfly.

NPC.name: guildmaster
NPC.description: Dressed in long, flowing robes, he paces back and forth in near agitation, mumbling distractedly to himself. You strain to catch what he's saying, but can't make heads or tails of it. Suddenly he stops, utters a few words causing something strange to happen, and then continues on with his pacing.
NPC.longDescription: Your guildmaster offers his expert knowledge in the magical arts.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Practice Mage NoPurge Trainer

NPC.name: guildmaster
NPC.description: Dressed in tight fitting clothes to allow for easy movement during training exercises, he is of a moderate build, well muscled and extremely agile. His every movement is concise and to the point, for he does not believe in wasting energies that could be better spent on his studies and teachings.
NPC.longDescription: Your guildmaster offers his expert knowledge in the tactical arts.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Practice Warrior NoPurge Trainer

NPC.name: guard mermaid guildguard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: A tall mermaid standing here, protecting the guild.

NPC.name: channeler elementalist guard guildguard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: The Channler's & Elementalist's Guild Guard stands guard over the guild.

NPC.name: necromancer guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter.
NPC.longDescription: The Necromancer's Guildguard stands guard over the guild.

NPC.name: warrior guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: The Warrior's Guildguard stands guard over the guild.

NPC.name: ranger guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: A powerful looking man in camouflage green guards the guild.

NPC.name: guildguard guard merman
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: A raven haired merman is here, protecting the guild.

NPC.name: guardsman guard gate
NPC.description: Charged with protecting the gates of Naiadia, this guard carefully watches all who enter, ever prepared to defend against any who show agression toward the inhabitants of the city.
NPC.longDescription: The gate's guardsman stands here watching the gate.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior NoAlign Rescue AssistVnum

NPC.name: guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: A white haired merman standing here, protecting the guild.

NPC.name: elite guardsman guard
NPC.description: Militant in posture - head high, shoulders back and stomach in, known to all as the absolute best of the best, this guard stands tall and proud, ready to defend Naiadia at all costs.
NPC.longDescription: An elite guardsman patrols the city.
NPC.flags: NPC StayArea Warrior NoAlign Rescue AssistVnum

NPC.name: chief guardsman guard
NPC.description: A very busy man, he is second in command of the town. He enforces the laws with an iron fist, yet rarely has to pull his weight as Naiadia is almost completely violence and crime-free. With incredible astuteness, he handpicks all his guardsman, assuring that only the best of the best uphold the laws of this peaceful town.
NPC.longDescription: The chief of the guardsman busies himself taking care of paperwork.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior NoAlign Rescue AssistVnum

NPC.name: mayor mermaid
NPC.description: Lustrous, raven black hair flows down her back, gently framing her heart-shaped face. She watches you with a gentle compassion shining in her midnight blue eyes. A born learder, she is the perfect Mayor for this fair town, ever ready to lend a hand and make any changes necessary for the betterment of the lives of those who gladly make their home here.
NPC.longDescription: A mermaid wearing the royal signet greets you with a warm smile.

NPC.name: waitress mermaid
NPC.description: She smiles flirtatiously and tosses her long, golden hair over her shoulder in a teasing manner. With a slightly pronounced swing to her hips, she sashays between the the tables, taking orders and serving meals.
NPC.longDescription: The waitress smiles broadly at you and asks you for your order.

NPC.name: armorer merman
NPC.description: He spends his days trying on the new armor, making sure there are no flaws or defects. Although there is very little call for armor in Naiadia, he is extremely proud of his shop. Most of his business comes from travelers passing through the area, which is perfectly allright with him.
NPC.longDescription: The armorer waits for you to make your selection.

NPC.name: guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: A guildguard stands here defending the guild.

NPC.name: guardsman guard
NPC.description: Entrusted with the general protection of Naiadia, this guard assists newcomers in finding their way; defends citizens against the rare, unwanted intrusions of passers through; and routinely patrol the city for trouble.
NPC.longDescription: A guardsman strolls around the city looking for signs of trouble.

NPC.name: banker eli
NPC.description: Thin and pale, he has spent his entire life indoors, studying and formulating mathematical equations and keeping the accounts of the bank. His only hobby is counting, which he loves more than anything else, especially when it's other people's money.
NPC.longDescription: The banker waits to help you with your transactions.

NPC.name: trainer
NPC.description: Well disciplined in both magic and tactics, he has spent his entire life, from early childhood on up, studying to become a master. It has always been his desire to train others and he takes great pride in his work.
NPC.longDescription: The trainer stands ready to train you for your future adventures.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Trainer NoTrack Mage Warrior NoPurge

NPC.name: weapon smith merman
NPC.description: Barbarically dressed, he is all muscle and brawn. His love of warfare is only exceeded by his love of his wife, Xuria. For her, he has given up that life, if not the mode of dress, to take on the position as the town's weapon's smith; although he is still prone to fits of wild antics. The only adornment he wears is a beautifully engraved wedding band signifying their eternal love for one another.
NPC.longDescription: The weapon's smith shows you his wide assortment of armaments.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea Warrior NoPurge Indoors Shopkeeper

NPC.name: naiadian woman
NPC.description: A gentle woman by nature, she would never even consider leaving Naiadia for parts known or unknown. Life for her is simple and joyous, loving and happy. She takes great pride in the town in which she lives and the family she has raised.
NPC.longDescription: A Naiadian woman greets you warmly.

NPC.name: naiadian man
NPC.description: A scholar by nature and by lack of need to be anything else, he lives an easy, comfortable life here in his native land. He makes his living by the sea, easily supporting his family with plenty left over for any guests that drop by expectedly or unexpectedly.
NPC.longDescription: A Naiadian man gallantly tips his hat to you.

NPC.name: healer
NPC.description: He is a simple man who enjoys leading a simple life. Although not from Naiadia, he has gladly made his home within its beautiful walls. With a natural flare for the healing arts, he makes his living selling cures to any who seek him out.
NPC.longDescription: The Healer of Naiadia is happy to sell you a cure.

NPC.name: naiadian child
NPC.description: Happy and carefree, this native born child has not a worry in the world, as Naiadia has almost no crime or violence.
NPC.longDescription: A Naiadian child smiles happily.

NPC.name: janitor
NPC.description: Extremely proud of the town in which he was born and raised, he has dedicated his life to keeping it beautiful, as is very obvious by the lack of debris anywhere in the city.
NPC.longDescription: The janitor strolls about the town, picking up the rare pieces of litter.

NPC.name: sailor
NPC.description: A shock of white hair offsets cornflower blue eyes lined liberally with laugh lines. His hands, badly caloused from years of manual labor, move knowledgeably over the pieces of wood he is preparing to use to make a new boat, as he happily whistles a jaunty little tune to himself.
NPC.longDescription: A sailor carefully refinishes a damaged boat.

NPC.name: merchant magic
NPC.description: Born and raised here in Naiadia, she thoroughly enjoys collecting rare and unusual magical items for her shop. For those who don't know her, her utterly contented smile seems a bit strange, but she is so much in love with her husband, Sulfur, that the world is simply perfect to her. She wears a single piece of jewelry, a beautifully engraved wedding ring that symbolizes their eternal love for one another.
NPC.longDescription: The magic's merchant proudly shows you her wares.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Warrior NoPurge Indoors Shopkeeper

NPC.name: shopkeeper
NPC.description: Lustrous black hair flows down to her waist, gently framing her sinuous body. Dark, violet eyes smile up at you in greeting as she moves from shelf to shelf, straightening any items she finds out of place as she restocks the shelves.
NPC.longDescription: The shopkeeper smiles at you as she stocks the shelf.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Warrior NoPurge Indoors Shopkeeper

NPC.name: antique's dealer
NPC.description: Salt and pepper hair has been severely pulled back in a bun to avoid getting entangled in some of the more intricate antiques as she dusts and polishes them. Despite this, her face is warm and welcoming and she loves to tell customers the stories behind the items they show an interest in.
NPC.longDescription: The antique's dealer bustles about dusting off her treasures.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Warrior NoPurge Indoors Shopkeeper

NPC.name: petshop girl
NPC.description: Gentle and kind, she loves all animals and can never resist aiding one in distress. When the Pet Store opened, she jumped at the chance to make her living doing what she loved the most and to care for such unusual animals.
NPC.longDescription: A young girl moves from tank to tank, feeding the fish.

NPC.name: salesclerk clerk merman
NPC.description: With the skilled hands of a surgeon, he can tan a hide in record time. He worked for many years in arctic climates, then decided he could do the same job in warmer climates where he could catch some sun in between treatments, instead of shivering before a tiny fire.
NPC.longDescription: The salesclerk offers to show you the latest styles.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Warrior NoPurge Indoors Shopkeeper

NPC.name: merchant merman
NPC.description: Born and raised here in Naiadia, he was never a child who had to be pushed to eat his veggies. On the contrary, his parents had the hardest time getting him to eat meat. When he reached adulthood, he decided to open a restuarant where all they served was foods grown from the earth, and some grown underwater, for other people like himself.
NPC.longDescription: The owner busies himself making up a seaweed salad.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea NoPurge Indoors Shopkeeper

NPC.name: waitress
NPC.description: Small of stature, she moves unobstrusively about the room, blending almost perfectly into the background. She comes from a far off, overpopulated land and has happily settled here, serving the people of Naiadia his native food.
NPC.longDescription: A waiter moves silently from table to table, serving his native food.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel StayArea NoPurge Indoors Shopkeeper

NPC.name: bartender merman
NPC.description: Old and weathered, his skin is like toughened rawhide from a life spent at sea. Retired now, he's content to kick back and relax when he's not serving drinks. His favorite pasttime is telling stories of his younger, wilder days to anyone who enjoys a good tale.
NPC.longDescription: The bartender waits to take your order.

NPC.name: jeweler merman
NPC.description: Skin wrinkled with age, he squints blissfully at the world through his favorite jewelers loupe. Known the world over, he is renowned for his ability to cut stones to their maximum potential, creating masterpieces of rare and exceptional beauty.
NPC.longDescription: The jeweler carefully sets a diamond in an engagement ring.

NPC.name: antipaladin guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: The Anti-Paladin's Guildguard stands here defending the guild.

NPC.name: guildguard guard paladin
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: The Paladin's Guildguard is here watching over the guild.

NPC.name: cleric monk guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: The Cleric's & Monk's Guildguard stands here defending the guild.

NPC.name: guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: A guildguard stands here defending the guild.

NPC.name: assassin guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: The Assassin's Guildguard stands guard over the guild.

NPC.name: thief guildguard guard
NPC.description: Tall and proud, he stands sentinel before the guild, making sure no unwanted guests enter. He thoroughly enjoys his job and takes his duties very seriously. He would as soon be slain on the spot as be caught slacking off.
NPC.longDescription: The Thieves's Guildguard stands guard over the guild.

NPC.name: guildmaster
NPC.description: Dressed in long, flowing robes, she paces back and forth in near agitation, mumbling distractedly to herself. You strain to catch what she's saying, but can't make heads or tails of it. Suddenly she stops, utters a few words causing something strange to happen, and then continues on with her pacing.
NPC.longDescription: Your guildmaster offers her expert knowledge in the magical arts.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Practice Mage NoPurge Trainer

NPC.name: field mouse
NPC.description: Forever in seach of food, this tiny, brown mouse scurries about, collecting sunflower seeds and any crumbs dropped by passersby.
NPC.longDescription: A field mouse scurries admist the sunflower stalks.

NPC.name: guildmaster
NPC.description: Dressed in tight fitting clothes to allow for easy movement during training exercises, she is of a moderate build, well toned and extremely agile. Her every movement is concise and to the point, for she does not believe in wasting energies that could be better spent on her studies and teachings.
NPC.longDescription: Your guildmaster offers her expert knowledge in the tactical arts.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Practice Warrior NoPurge Trainer

NPC.name: gardener
NPC.description: She truly has a green thumb; everything she touches grows, almost as if by magic. With loving hands, she tends to the gardens like a mother tending to her children.
NPC.longDescription: The gardener carefully tends the flowers, keeping the weeds at bay.

NPC.name: albatross pet
NPC.description: Wings spread ten feet wide, it soars gracefully overhead. It listens aptly, careful not to miss its master's call.
NPC.longDescription: An albatross glides overhead, waiting to serve its master.

NPC.name: seagull
NPC.description: Its shrill cries can be heard a great distance off as is searches for food, waiting for its master's call.
NPC.longDescription: A seagull flies over your head, waiting to serve its master.

NPC.name: sea otter
NPC.description: As playful as a small child, everything movable and within its reach is a toy to it. It rolls around, playing with a small object, while it awaits its master's command.
NPC.longDescription: A sea otter looks for something to play with while it waits to serve its master.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared DarkVision Swim DetectIllusion

NPC.name: seal
NPC.description: Sleek black skin glistens in the light as its sinuous body moves with amazing grace. It stands beside its master, ever ready to do whatever is needed of it.
NPC.longDescription: A sleek looking seal waits to do its master's bidding.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared DarkVision Swim DetectIllusion

NPC.name: walrus
NPC.description: Covered in prickly whiskers, with tusks nearly grazing the ground, it stands sentinel by its master, awaiting its next order.
NPC.longDescription: A walrus stands sentinel, guarding its master.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared DarkVision Swim DetectIllusion

NPC.name: sandpiper
NPC.description: It darts all about, with skillful grace, avoiding passersby, yet somehow managing to never stray far from its master.
NPC.longDescription: A sandpiper skitters about, awaiting its masters command.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Infrared Flying DarkVision Swim

NPC.name: lady sea ranger
NPC.description: This woman regards you with silent consideration, neither judging nor caring about your presence. She is prefectly in harmony with her surroundings, here on the small island in the middle of the vast sea.
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful lady in sea-blue clothing is meditating here.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectEvil DetectInvis DetectMagic DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared DetectIllusion

NPC.name: cat orange
NPC.description: Beloved pet of the Gods, this large, orange tabby spends his days napping or playing with his best buddy.
NPC.longDescription: A large, orange tabby is ready to cause some mischief.

Item.Name: ancient tome
Item.LongDescription: Volume II of an ancient tome, "Bonds of Malevolence" is laying here

ExtraDescription.Description: In the Age of Malice while the Lord of Hate's strength increased, another force, more powerful took root and began to grow. Through the eyes of a child the mind of a man saw the misery of the world. Growing and maturing in that cheerless time he was impressed into the dark order of knights that conquered every inch of land they could see. He fought valiantly for the knighthood but refused to impose the suffering and torture on those he cut down as his brothers were wont to do. Believing in letting death give them safety from the harshness of the world so they may be at final peace. As the people continued to suffer at the hands of Hate, through his knights and demons, the young mans empathy for the fallen increased. Believing death to be a release, a blessed gift, to be reserved for those in pain and suffering or as a reward for a long life, he revolted at the slaughter of the young and innocent. Love, through his gifts to the people, drew this man in giving him the courage and hope to stand against the evil that swept the land. Facing Hate in single combat he forced the God to his knees. As he drew to take the final killing blow he stopped. Feeling the omnipotent being was unworthy of such a precious boon the young mortal imprisoned him in his dark home below the earth. The man mortally wounded in his trial expired shortly after. Love in his gratitude gave him immortal life giving him reign over the powers that he used with such care. Hate sat in the depths of oblivion simmering and fuming at his defeat. Constantly fighting his bonds he manages to escape from time to time to wreak havoc on the mortal land and the immortals that seek to imprison him. Always seeking revenge on the last face he sees before being forced to return to the abyss.

Item.Name: ancient tome
Item.LongDescription: Volume III of an ancient tome, "To Suffer Loss" is laying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Peace befell the mortal world after the imprisonment of Hate. Love watched his children grow prosperous turning to him less and less as they became self sufficiant. There came a time when they resolved disputes without turning to thier father. Love was both pleased and saddened by thier independence. In his devotion decided to leave the men and elves to thier own devices, so that they may make thier own futures and use his gifts by thier own choosing. Bidding farewell to his father and his children he fell into an eternal sleep and returned to the void that created him. Chaos was saddened by the departure of his golden child. Wandering the lands his tears salted the earth, and were carried on the winds to the seas, giving them life. The elemental powers pitied the Lord and tried thier mightiest to ease his burden. A young sylph, fragile and beautiful, made from the delicate summer breezes, consoled Chaos reminding him of the gifts that Love left behind. The lands and the seas and all they contain, all to please his eye and his heart, reminding him that his son was still there in his children Chaos, his spirits raised thought deeply on the words of the maid. Slowly in his mind a shadow emerged a swirl of light and dark. Allowing the shadow to take form Chaos brought forth Knowledge making him the imbodiment of both of his eldest sons, enlightened by the powers of the dark and the light. Knowledge above all things sought to learn, dismissing involvement in the mortal world other than to silently observe. He found solace in his books and scrolls and was constantly in search of new thoughts and ideas. The god took a single human to chronicle the events of the mortal world and then locked himself away leavin his aide on his own, confidant in his abilities. Disappointed by the lack of interest in his brothers creations Chaos turned from his son leaving him to his solitary pursuits. And so ends the Age of Malice when the worlds dreams begin to awaken.

Item.Name: ancient tome
Item.LongDescription: Volume IV of an ancient tome, "Pitfalls of Knowledge" is laying here.

ExtraDescription.Description: The Age of Dreams floated into existance on the winds of a summer breeze. The Keeper of Knowledge looked over the lands of his brother finding little that interested him. Turning to his books and spending long hours in deep thought the time passed by him quickly. Slowly the stories and legends of the lands fell upon his ears. The jumble of words and voices distracted and annoyed him for he noticed himself listening in hope of gaining the smallest bit of new information. Finding himself drawn to the mortal world once too often to hang on a story told in the small pubs littering the landscape. While on one of his excursions he observed a young man frantically scribbling in a corner of the bar while an elderly gentleman told stories to the children. Intrigued he peered over the youngsters shoulder and was amazed to see him writing down the mans words as soon as he spoke. Struck by an idea he took the youth to his temple hidden just below the surface of the earth. Knowledge gave him a magical pen and a blank tome. In exchange the stripling was to write down all he heard, the bargin struck the god again turned from the world to silently horde the information After many years the young man began to realize that fewer and fewer stories and legends were being told and the people were no longer learning new things. Worried, the disciple turned to his mentor who simply brushed him off as he placed the latest manuscript in the huge vault occupying his temple and returned to his studies. Realizing that the Lord was taking the peoples will to create and discover for his own selfish needs the adept opened the vault determined to return learning to the world. Throwing open the door he was blinded by the power that lied within a churning mixture of the light and dark. As the power escaped it hit the boy swirled around him and found safety in his heart. Knowledge stripped of his possesions fell into his greed and was consumed by it. Emerging changed and devoured by his desires the immortal settled on aquiring, hording, and protecting all he could. >From the smallest trinket to the souls of men.

Item.Name: sign
Item.LongDescription: A large post with a sign is resting on the beach.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign reads: To board the boat to Palanthas and the mainland, type 'board' and wait for the boat to take you to Palanthas. If you are a visitor to the island of Naiadia, enjoy your stay.

Item.Name: sign bank
Item.LongDescription: A sign has been posted to the wall.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign reads: Welcome to the Naiadian Royal bank. You may: Balance: Check you current bank balance. Withdraw: Withdraw money from your account. Deposit: Deposit money into your account.
